tasks.task: Farming operations on a cotton farm
subtasks: Observing the growth and preparation of the first cotton crop
Noting the readiness of the first crop for plucking
Considering the timing and need for rain for the second crop
Identifying the cotton variety (Lipro) and its characteristics
Managing the garden and preparing the field for subsequent crops
Addressing the impact of inconsistent rainfall on planting schedules
Evaluating the condition of the cotton plants for potential insect damage
Taking steps to protect crops from pests or diseases
Locating and handling the custard apple trees within the farm
Collecting or managing organic produce (custard apples) without pesticide use

tasks.task: Navigating and surveying the farm property
subtasks: Determining slipperiness or challenging terrain while walking through the farm
Avoiding obstacles like ditches or low-lying areas during farm inspections
Checking the perimeter of the farm to ensure no unauthorized access
Inspecting the condition of farm structures, fences, or pathways
Observing the layout and organization of different crop areas within the farm
